message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I think you'll find it meets your needs and exceeds your expectations. Would you like to buy it from me for $18000?
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12000?
I understand that $12000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be open to considering a price of $15000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $15000 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12500?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $15000, but I'm willing to compromise further. Would you be willing to meet me at $14000?
I'm getting close, but I still think $14000 is a bit too high. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13500?
I'm getting closer to your target, but I still need to make a profit. Would you be willing to meet me at $14500?
I'm really close to walking away, but I'm willing to make one last offer. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13000?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $14000, as that's the minimum I'm willing to accept. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
